Description:
In the game The Walking Dead: Season 2 continues the story of Clementine , a girl orphaned by invasion of the undead. Forced to take care of herself, she learns to survive in a crazy world .

Many months have passed since the events of The Walking Dead: Season 1 , and Clementine is trying to secure safety. But as a normal child can survive when the living is no better and sometimes worse than dead ? Playing as Clementines , you will encounter situations and dilemmas , test your moral qualities and the survival instinct . In this sequel to one of the best games of 2012 your decisions and actions change history
